name: Cozy Retreat Suite
description: A comfortable and affordable room with a cozy ambiance, perfect for a quick getaway.

name: Luxury Ocean View Room
description: Experience a breathtaking ocean view from this luxurious room with all the amenities you need.

name: Family Paradise Suite
description: A spacious suite designed for families, featuring a separate living area and a kitchenette.

name: Executive Business Room
description: A well-appointed room tailored for business travelers, with a dedicated workspace and high-speed internet.

name: Romantic Honeymoon Suite
description: Celebrate your love in style with a romantic suite featuring a private balcony and a heart-shaped Jacuzzi.

name: Nature Lover's Cabin
description: Escape to a rustic cabin in the woods, surrounded by nature and all the comforts of home.
